revision.text: Possibly: An Authentic account of an embassy from the King of Great Britain to the Emperor of China; including cursory observations made, and information obtained, in travelling through that ancient empire, and a small part of Chinese Tartary. (By George Staunton). 2v. (London : Printed by W. Bulmer and Co. for G. Nicol, Bookseller to His Majesty, Pall-Mall, MDCCXCVII. [1797]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511758~S1
